code: import React from"react";import"./style.css";import{Helmet,HelmetProvider}from"react-helmet-async";import{Container,Row,Col}from"react-bootstrap";import{testimonials,meta}from"../../content_option";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Testimonials=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HelmetProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"About-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{charSet:"utf-8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("title",{children:[" Testimonials | ",meta.title," "]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"description",content:meta.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"mb-5 mt-3 pt-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{lg:"8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"display-4 mb-4",children:" Testimonials "})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"t_border my-4 ml-0 text-left"})]})}),testimonials.map((data,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"sec_sp",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{lg:"5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"color_sec py-4",children:data.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"color_sec py-4",children:data.title})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"7",className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:"justify"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.description})})})]});})]})});};
